name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Field Engineer with 13+ years of robust experience in delivering technical support across healthcare and financial domains. Expertise in Imaging Systems and equipped with a strong foundation in IT Diagnosis and Network Connectivity. Competent in providing preventative maintenance and software diagnosis, ensuring seamless mechanical and electronic systems performance. Customers benefit from outstanding service and troubleshooting skills. 

Further solidifying my technical acumen, I have hands-on experience with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, alongside proficiency in front-end and back-end development technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. With a proven track record of building AI/ML-powered platforms, I have successfully integrated predictive analytics and automation into cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure** utilizing microservices and event-driven architectures. Committed to quality, I implement CI/CD pipelines adhering to compliance-driven development standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS.
